actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: To designate the medical center of the Department of Veterans Affairs located in Anchorage, Alaska, as the "Colonel Mary Louise Rasmuson Campus of the Alaska VA Healthcare System", and for other purposes.
short_title: Colonel Mary Louise Rasmuson Campus of the Alaska VA Healthcare System Act of 2022

summary.text:
Colonel Mary Louise Rasmuson Campus of the Alaska VA Healthcare System Act of 2022

This bill designates the medical center of the Department of Veterans Affairs in Anchorage, Alaska, as the Colonel Mary Louise Rasmuson Campus of the Alaska VA Healthcare System.

titles.title: Colonel Mary Louise Rasmuson Campus of the Alaska VA Healthcare System Act of 2022

To designate the medical center of the Department of Veterans Affairs located in Anchorage, Alaska, as the "Colonel Mary Louise Rasmuson Campus of the Alaska VA Healthcare System", and for other purposes.
